net.sf.mmm.client.ui.gwt.widgets.richtext

Interface FeatureBehavior

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AttributeReadEnabled, AttributeReadVisible, AttributeWriteEnabled, AttributeWriteVisible
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractClickFeatureBehavior, AbstractColorFeatureBehavior, AbstractFeatureBehavior, AbstractSelectionFeatureBehavior, AbstractSimpleClickFeatureBehavior, AbstractToggleFeatureBehavior, FeatureBehaviorAlignCenter, FeatureBehaviorAlignLeft, FeatureBehaviorAlignRight, FeatureBehaviorBackgroundColor, FeatureBehaviorBold, FeatureBehaviorFontColor, FeatureBehaviorFontFamily, FeatureBehaviorFontSize, FeatureBehaviorHorizontalLine, FeatureBehaviorIndent, FeatureBehaviorInsertImage, FeatureBehaviorInsertLink, FeatureBehaviorItalic, FeatureBehaviorOrderedList, FeatureBehaviorOutdent, FeatureBehaviorRedo, FeatureBehaviorRemoveFormat, FeatureBehaviorStrikethrough, FeatureBehaviorSubscript, FeatureBehaviorSuperscript, FeatureBehaviorUnderline, FeatureBehaviorUndo, FeatureBehaviorUnorderedList

    interface FeatureBehavior
extends AttributeWriteVisible, AttributeWriteEnabled
    The interface for the behavior of a RichTextFeature.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyFontSettings()
      Updates the RichTextArea according to the value from the widget for the font-settings.
      RichTextFeature getFeature() 
      LabelWidget getFontSettingsLabel() 
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget getFontSettingsWidget() 
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget getToolbarWidget() 
      void setFontSettingsPreviewElement(com.google.gwt.dom.client.Element element)
      Updates the RichTextArea according to the value from the widget for the font-settings.
      void updateFontSettings()
      Updates the value of the widget for the font-settings according to the state of the RichTextArea.
      void updateToolbar()
      Updates the status of the FeatureBehavior in the toolbar widget after a change.

    • Method Detail

      • updateToolbar

        void updateToolbar()
        Updates the status of the FeatureBehavior in the toolbar widget after a change. E.g. toggle buttons are updated to reflect the current state.

      • updateFontSettings

        void updateFontSettings()
        Updates the value of the widget for the font-settings according to the state of the RichTextArea.

      • applyFontSettings

        void applyFontSettings()
        Updates the RichTextArea according to the value from the widget for the font-settings.

      • setFontSettingsPreviewElement

        void setFontSettingsPreviewElement(com.google.gwt.dom.client.Element element)
        Updates the RichTextArea according to the value from the widget for the font-settings.
        Parameters:
        element - is the Element where to apply font settings whenever the value changed.

      • getFeature

        RichTextFeature getFeature()
        Returns:
        the RichTextFeature implemented by this object.

      • getToolbarWidget

        com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget getToolbarWidget()
        Returns:
        the Widget (typically a icon button) for the feature in the RichTextToolbar.

      • getFontSettingsWidget

        com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget getFontSettingsWidget()
        Returns:
        the Widget for the feature in the RichTextToolbar.FontSettingsPopup.

      • getFontSettingsLabel

        LabelWidget getFontSettingsLabel()
        Returns:
        the LabelWidget for the feature in the RichTextToolbar.FontSettingsPopup or null if not intended (e.g. toggle features use a CheckBox as popup widget and do not have a separate label).
